availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph R. Witty (Metcalfe County, Kentucky, sheriff)

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Mary F. Huffman Witty in Barren County on April 15, 1862. Sheriff in Metcalfe County in 1860. Sheriff in Metcalfe County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe County, East Fork post office, p. 916.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 100B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Barren County Marriages, Film #000216816.
Find A Grave, "Joseph R. Witty (Nov. 19, 1831-July 16, 1898)," Memorial #15876868, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15876868 (accessed May 1, 2019).
